item.title: Screen Watch Dog v1.11 Released
item.description: Screen Watch Dog App This little application will help you to monitor your screen while you are not looking at it. Here is how you can use it: 1. Move main Application window to the screen you wish to monitor. 2. Press button 'Select watch bounds'. 3. Press the and hold left mouse button. 4. Draw a rectangle across your area of interest. 5. Release left mouse button. 6. Application will monitor changes that happened in the selected area.
